snippet: Nothing could stifle Dan Payne's spirits Tuesday, not even the U.S. team's heartbreaking 17-14 loss in rugby sevens when Argentina scored after the siren....
lead_paragraph: Nothing could stifle Dan Payne's spirits Tuesday, not even the U.S. team's heartbreaking 17-14 loss in rugby sevens when Argentina scored after the siren.

headline.main: CEO of USA Rugby Sees Big Boost for Sport Back Home
headline.print_headline: CEO of USA Rugby Sees Big Boost for Sport Back Home
